projects.title: MiniDesk ‚Äì Smart Bookmark Manager
projects.description: MiniDesk is a Chrome extension for managing bookmarks and boosting productivity with handy widgets. Built with Express.js & React.js (Material UI) and deployed on Heroku. I contributed as a Full Stack Developer under Alex Kuhn (ex-Apple Engineer) and presented it at Brunel University to 100+ people.

projects.title: GitHub Globe
projects.description: Inspired by GitHub‚Äôs homepage, this open-source 3D globe visualizes activity using Three.js. Built with three-globe, it features a custom-shaded space environment and includes my flight history from 2022-2023.

projects.title: Flight Booking System
projects.description: A Java Swing-based flight booking system featuring interactive maps for seamless navigation. It integrates in-flight retail, allowing users to purchase food and products directly from the interface, bridging travel and commerce. Supervised by Zear Ibrahim (Brunel University), I led both the system design and development, ensuring an intuitive Java GUI experience. This project showcases innovative potential for merging travel and retail within a single platform.
